entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sherbrooke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sherbrooke Airport 09:54 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure: 99.3 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow except rain near the border this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
